DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of two vaginal products compared with that of placebo to determine if the two products are better than placebo in the relief of vaginal discomfort.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Two Vaginal Products Versus Placebo in Patients With Vaginal Discomfort
DOC.criteria: Patients must have sought doctor's care for this condition. Patients must be having menstrual cycles. Patients must not have any vaginal infections. Patients must not be pregnant or nursing. Must not be receiving any other medicinal therapies or any medications that would interfere with the outcome of the study.
